); } *///dynamic value fetching import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import DashboardLayout from"../components/layout/DashboardLayout";import StatCard from"../components/cards/StatCard";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Dashboard(){const[stats,setStats]=useState({totalUsers:0,buyers:0,sellers:0,pendingUsers:0,activeUsers:0});const fetchDashboardStats=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("adminToken");const res=await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/api/v1/admin/users",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setStats({totalUsers:res.data.totalUsers,buyers:res.data.buyers,sellers:res.data.sellers,pendingUsers:res.data.pendingUsers,activeUsers:res.data.activeUsers});}catch(error){console.error("Dashboard fetch error:",error);}};// ðŸ” Real-time polling (every 5 seconds) useEffect(()=>{fetchDashboardStats();const interval=setInterval(fetchDashboardStats,5000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DashboardLayout,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-center text-blue-600",children:"Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-8 font-semibold text-blue-600",children:"Welcome back, Admin"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-5 gap-6 mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{title:"Total Users",value:stats.totalUsers,subtitle:"".concat(stats.buyers," Buyers / ").concat(stats.sellers," Sellers")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{title:"Active Users",value:stats.activeUsers,subtitle:"Online in last 5 mins",highlight:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{title:"Pending Verifications",value:stats.pendingUsers}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{title:"Total Inquiries",value:"--",subtitle:"API pending"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StatCard,{title:"Deals Closed",value:"--",subtitle:"API pending",success:true})]})]});}
